title: Topics in Architectural History
description: In-depth examination of a significant region, movement or period in architectural history, theory and criticism. The material covered will vary depending upon the topic. The Schedule of Classes will list topic selected. Total credit limited to 8 units. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for Architecture majors.
prerequisites: GE Area A1 and one of the following Area C3 courses: ARCH 217, 218, 219, or ART 112
